member.summary: Process an event

member.name: T:Windows.Devices.WiFi.AvailableNetworksChangedEventHandler
member.summary: Event raised when a scan completes on this Wi-Fi adapter.

member.name: T:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiAdapter
member.summary: Provides a means to scan for nearby WiFi access points, enumerate those that are found, and connect to an access point.

member.name: E:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiAdapter.AvailableNetworksChanged
member.summary: Event raised when a scan completes on this Wi-Fi adapter.

member.name: P:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiAdapter.NetworkInterface
member.summary: Gets the network interface number associatted with this Wi-Fi adapter

member.name: P:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiAdapter.NetworkReport
member.summary: Gets a list of available networks populated by the last Wi-Fi scan on this WiFiNetworkAdapter.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiAdapter.Connect(Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiAvailableNetwork,Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiReconnectionKind,System.String)
member.summary: Connect this Wi-Fi device to the specified network, with the specified passphrase and reconnection policy.
member.param: Describes the Wi-Fi network to be connected.
Specifies how to reconnect if the connection is lost.
The passphrase to be used to connect to the access point.
member.returns: On successful conclusion of the operation, returns an object that describes the result of the connect operation.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiAdapter.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects any active Wi-Fi connection through this adapter.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiAdapter.FindAllAdapters
member.summary: A static method that enumerates all the Wi-Fi adapters in the system.
member.returns: >On successful completion, returns an array of WiFiAdapter objects

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiAdapter.ScanAsync
member.summary: Directs this adapter to initiate an asynchronous network scan.
member.remarks: On successful completion, returns a list of networks scanned by this adapter signalled by the AvailableNetworksChanged event. Use NetworkReport to retrive the list of available Networks.

member.name: M:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiAdapter.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose WiFiAdapter

member.summary: Gets the SSID (name) of the network.

member.summary: Gets a value describing the kind of network being described.

member.summary: Gets the connection result value.

member.summary: Status of the connection attempt.

member.name: F:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiConnectionStatus.AccessRevoked
member.summary: Connection failed because access to the network has been revoked.

member.summary: Connection failed because an invalid credential was presented.

member.summary: Connection failed because the network is not available.

member.name: F:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiConnectionStatus.Success
member.summary: Connection succeeded.

member.name: F:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiConnectionStatus.Timeout
member.summary: Connection failed because the connection attempt timed out.

member.name: F:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiConnectionStatus.UnspecifiedFailure
member.summary: Connection failed for a reason other than those in this list.

member.name: F:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiConnectionStatus.UnsupportedAuthenticationProtocol
member.summary: Connection failed because the authentication protocol is not supported.

member.name: F:Windows.Devices.WiFi.WiFiNetworkKind.Infrastructure
